description: A tale of warmth and laughter, set in the chilly embrace of a South African winter, where a simple culinary delight becomes a symbol of comfort and joy.
title: Winter Warmth
n_1: A crisp winter morning in Johannesburg, Mpho visits Lerato, bearing a pot of homemade curry.
c1_1: Smell this! It's the secret to surviving winter here.
c2_1: It smells like heaven! Is that your famous curry?
n_2: Lerato takes a spoonful, her eyes lighting up with the first taste.
c1_2: Exactly! 'Keep calm and curry on', that's the motto.
c2_2: It's more than a motto; it's a warm hug in a bowl.
n_3: They share a laugh, the warmth of the curry beating the cold outside.
c1_3: Every winter, this curry makes me forget about the cold.
c2_3: And every winter, your curry brings us closer.
n_4: As the day ends, the curry pot is empty, but their hearts are full.
c2_4: Only if you promise to bring the curry!
